channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Is the stock market open on Christmas Eve? Does the post office deliver mail?
item.description: It’s the height of the holiday season, so expect schedule changes.

item.title: Your financial adviser has a plan for your money. But what if it’s their plan too?
item.description: To get you to follow their advice, your adviser says, “I do this for myself.” Is that good enough?

item.title: Donald Trump says Vladimir Putin wants a meeting as soon as possible about the war in Ukraine
item.description: "President Putin said that he wants to meet with me as soon as possible," Trump said during his remarks at Turning Point's AmericaFest convention.

item.title: Netflix payout of $150 million for this pair of NFL games is a ‘prestige’ play, expert says
item.description: Christmas Day football games will be streamed exclusively on Netflix. Here’s what you should know.

item.title: S&P 500 futures are little changed after positive start to the holiday trading week: Live updates
item.description: The major averages posted modest gains on Monday to begin the holiday-shortened trading week.

item.title: This home builder issued its third profit warning in three months. Its stock is tanking.
item.description: Britain’s Vistry Group on Tuesday issued its third profit warning in as many months, sending its already-battered stock spiraling lower.

item.title: Silicon Valley's White House influence grows as Trump taps tech execs for key roles
item.description: Trump nominated top tech leaders for key spots in his administration, including executives who've held roles at Andreessen Horowitz and PayPal.

item.title: European markets open higher in shortened session ahead of Christmas; Novo Nordisk resumes recovery
item.description: European stocks edged higher at the open on Tuesday.

item.title: Shutdown deal cost IRS $20 billion to probe for tax cheats, maybe for good
item.description: The IRS estimates there will be 8,000 fewer audits of wealthy taxpayers and businesses though 2029 without the sidelined $20.2 billion.

item.title: Asia-Pacific markets trade mixed after Wall Street gains on tech strength
item.description: Traders will monitor any developments related to the planned merger of Japanese automakers Nissan and Honda.

item.title: China plans $411 billion special treasury bond issuance next year, Reuters reports
item.description: Chinese authorities is issuing $411 billion worth of special treasury bonds next year, which would be the highest on record, Reuters reports.

item.title: Treasury yields retreat ahead of the Christmas holiday
item.description: Treasury yields retreated Tuesday in a holiday-shortened trading session ahead of the Christmas break.
